item.title: 阿根廷免除比索债务，缓解受创货币压力
item.description: 阿根廷当局表示，他们在周三成功展期了一大批地方债务，通过了哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在中期选举前遏制比索下滑战略的关键考验。【原文：Argentine authorities said they successfully rolled over a large batch of local debt on Wednesday, passing a key test for Javier Milei’s strategy to contain a slide in the peso ahead of mid-term elections.】

item.title: 受关税影响的巴西寻求墨西哥批准建立更多牛肉加工厂
item.description: 巴西更接近于获准从更多工厂向墨西哥出口牛肉，因为这个拉丁美洲最大的经济体在受到美国关税打击后正在寻求新的市场。【原文：Brazil moved closer to obtaining approval to export beef to Mexico from more plants as Latin America’s biggest economy seeks new markets after being hit by US tariffs.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省将对数据中心的计算机硬件征收 2% 的税费
item.description: 艾伯塔省计划从明年年底开始对大型数据中心的计算机硬件征收 2% 的税。【原文：Alberta plans to impose a 2% levy on the computer hardware on large data centers starting at the end of next year.】

item.title: 在美国推动下，墨西哥将提高从中国进口的商品关税
item.description: 墨西哥政府计划在下个月的 2026 年预算提案中增加对中国的关税，以保护本国企业免受廉价进口产品的冲击，并满足美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的长期要求。【原文：The Mexican government plans to increase tariffs on China as part of its 2026 budget proposal next month, protecting the nation’s businesses from cheap imports and satisfying a longstanding demand of US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 雪花带来强劲前景，消除对软件弊病的担忧
item.description: 雪花公司（Snowflake Inc.该公司股价在延时交易中跳涨。【原文：Snowflake Inc. gave a sales outlook for the fiscal year that topped analysts’ estimates, overcoming anxiety that software vendors will be hurt as the economy slows and new artificial intelligence companies take away business. The shares jumped in extended trading.】

item.title: 英伟达发布低迷预测，引发对人工智能发展放缓的担忧
item.description: 全球最有价值的上市公司英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable publicly traded company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, fueling concerns that a massive run-up in artificial intelligence spending is slowing.】

item.title: 花旗集团称因美联储风险将加大对多头债券的押注
item.description: 花旗集团的策略师们建议，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统将破坏美联储的政治独立性，长期美国债券将表现不佳，美元将下跌。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s strategists recommended adding to bets that longer-term US bonds will underperform and the dollar will decline due to the risk that President Donald Trump will undermine the Federal Reserve’s political independence.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 季度预测低于分析师预期
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. 预计本季度销售额略低于分析师预期，这家网络安全公司正努力摆脱去年引发的全球计算机故障造成的损失。【原文：CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. projected sales for the current quarter that narrowly missed analysts’ estimates, as the cybersecurity company seeks to move past the costs of the global computer outage it triggered last year.】

item.title: 惠普利润预测显示其能抵御关税冲击
item.description: 惠普公司（HP Inc. ）发布的本季度利润展望可能超出预期，显示出计算机需求的坚挺，以及对可运行最新人工智能软件的新机器的兴趣。【原文：HP Inc. gave a profit outlook for the current quarter that may beat expectations, showing firming demand for computers and interest in new machines that can run the latest AI software.】

item.title: GTCR 正在洽谈私人债务，为竞购药品制造商 Zentiva 提供资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司GTCR正在与包括KKR & Co.在内的直接贷款人谈判，以筹集资金支持收购仿制药制造商Zentiva。【原文：Private equity firm GTCR is in talks with direct lenders including KKR & Co. to drum up financing to support a bid to acquire generic drugmaker Zentiva, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达第二季度收益分析
item.description: Nvidia Corp.GB200 Grace Blackwell 超级芯片 摄影师：Annabelle Chih/BloombergAnnabelle Chih/Bloomberg【原文：An Nvidia Corp. GB200 Grace Blackwell superchip Photographer: Annabelle Chih/Bloomberg】

item.title: 获得 Accel 投资后，Vercel 估值翻了三番，达到 90 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，帮助企业在云端开发网络和人工智能应用的初创公司 Vercel 正在以约 90 亿美元的估值融资数亿美元。【原文：Vercel, a startup that helps companies develop web and artificial intelligence applications in the cloud, is raising hundreds of millions of dollars at a valuation of about $9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行称墨西哥汇款放缓可能阻止比索反弹
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，汇往墨西哥的汇款已降至三年来的最低水平，这一趋势可能会在短期内对比索造成压力。【原文：Remittances to Mexico have slumped to their lowest level in three years, a trend that may weigh on the peso in the near-term, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 前中国人民银行行长周小川反驳中国稳定币构想
item.description: 中国前央行行长周小川就稳定币的潜在危险发出警告，这使他与政策顾问和经济学家日益强烈的要求中国考虑使用稳定币的呼声背道而驰。【原文：China’s former central bank chief Zhou Xiaochuan issued a warning about the potential dangers of stablecoins, putting him in opposition to growing calls by policy advisers and economists for China to consider their use.】

item.title: 尽管对五年期国债的需求冷淡，但国债涨势不减
item.description: 尽管对五年期国债拍卖的需求冷淡，但国债仍保持了升势，使较短期国债收益率达到过去一个月的最低水平。【原文：Treasuries held an advance that sent shorter-maturity yields to the lowest levels of the past month despite cool demand for an auction of five-year notes.】

item.title: 关于美联储独立的几点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贝卢斯科尼的 MFE 在欧洲扩张中赢得德国广播公司控制权
item.description: 已故西尔维奥-贝卢斯科尼（Silvio Berlusconi）创办的广播公司 MFE-MediaForEurope NV 将控制 ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE 约 60% 的股份，此前这家德国公司的第二大股东已于周三同意出售其股份。【原文：MFE-MediaForEurope NV, the broadcaster founded by the late Silvio Berlusconi, will control around 60% of ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE after the German company’s second-largest shareholder agreed to sell its stake on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国公司在创纪录的时间内完成 1 万亿美元的回购狂潮
item.description: 美国公司正计划以历史性的速度回购股票，这表明美国企业对经济充满信心。【原文：US companies are planning to buy back shares at a historic pace, a sign of Corporate America’s confidence in the economy.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校首席财务官对高风险贷款提出最后恳求
item.description: 就在关键的预算投票前几天，芝加哥公立学校的最高财务官员认为，对于资金紧张的学区来说，增加借贷是个坏主意。【原文：Just days before a crucial budget vote, Chicago Public Schools’ top finance official is arguing that more borrowing is a bad idea for the cash-strapped district.】

item.title: 反特朗普经济学议程是什么？
item.description:
如果民主党重新掌权，他们应该回归新自由主义，还是采用自己版本的经济民粹主义，抑或是两者兼而有之？【原文：

If the Democrats return to power, should they revert to neoliberalism, adopt their own version of economic populism or perhaps something in between?

】

item.title: OpenAI 和 Anthropic 合作开展幻觉和越狱研究
item.description: 人工智能领域最大的两家竞争对手 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 最近对彼此的模型进行了评估，以便更好地了解自己的测试可能遗漏的问题。【原文：OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.】

item.title: 谷歌 Pixel 10 为更换三星或苹果手机提供了最佳理由
item.description:
评测：尽管设计变化极小，但最新款 Pixel 手机凭借全面的人工智能技术脱颖而出。【原文：

Review: Despite minimal design changes, the latest Pixel phones stand out thanks to a comprehensive approach to AI.

】

item.title: 家乐福首席执行官称法国动荡带来衰退风险
item.description: 法国家乐福首席执行官亚历山大-邦帕尔（Alexandre Bompard）说，法国的政治动荡有可能使该国陷入衰退，因为它增加了一直推动经济增长的消费者的不确定性。【原文：France’s political turmoil risks pushing the country into recession because it’s increasing uncertainty among consumers who had been driving growth, Carrefour SA Chief Executive Officer Alexandre Bompard said.】

item.title: 私人信贷夫妻二人面临破产压力
item.description: 加拿大最高资本市场监管机构已提出申请，要求曾经营私人贷款公司 Bridging Finance Inc. 的夫妻档大卫-夏普（David Sharpe）和娜塔莎-夏普（Natasha Sharpe）夫妇破产，因为他们未能支付数百万美元的罚金。【原文：Canada’s top capital markets regulator has filed applications to push David and Natasha Sharpe, the husband-and-wife team who once ran private lender Bridging Finance Inc., into bankruptcy after they failed to pay millions of dollars in sanctions.】

item.title: 花旗银行称美国白银和钯金溢价定价过低
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）分析师表示，考虑到关键矿产的关税风险，美国钯银价格与国际基准价格之间的差距太小。【原文：The gap between palladium and silver prices in the US and international benchmarks is too slim, given the risk of tariffs on critical minerals, Citigroup Inc analysts said.】

item.title: 匈牙利德鲁日巴输油管道周四恢复输油
item.description: 在乌克兰袭击德鲁日巴输油管网络后，俄罗斯对匈牙利的原油运输在停止近一周后可能于周四恢复。【原文：Russian crude oil shipments to Hungary may resume on Thursday after almost a week of halt following Ukraine’s attack on Druzhba pipeline network.】

item.title: 丰业银行从达拉斯获得 270 万美元用于开设地区中心
item.description: 丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）正在加强其在美国的业务布局，达拉斯将提供高达 270 万美元的奖励措施，以赢得该银行的下一个地区办事处。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia is beefing up its US footprint and Dallas is offering as much as $2.7 million in incentives to win the lender’s next regional office.】

item.title: Anthropic 称攻击者在大范围黑客攻击中使用了人工智能工具
item.description: 该公司表示，一名黑客利用 Anthropic PBC 的技术实施了一项大规模网络犯罪计划，影响了至少 17 家组织，这是攻击者广泛利用商业人工智能工具的 "史无前例 "的实例。【原文：A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.】

item.title: 美国网络支持枯竭，黑客肆虐州政府
item.description: 2013年8月20日星期二，美国明尼苏达州圣保罗市的明尼苏达州议会大厦。2012 年，明尼苏达州的实际 GDP 增长了 3.5%，在增长率排名中位居第五，仅次于北达科他州、得克萨斯州、俄勒冈州和华盛顿州。摄影师：阿丽亚娜-林奎斯特【原文：The Minnesota State Capitol stands in St. Paul, Minnesota, U.S., on Tuesday, Aug. 20, 2013. Minnesota's real GDP grew 3.5 percent in 2012 and was ranked fifth in growth after North Dakota, Texas, Oregon and Washington. Photographer: Ariana Lindquist】

item.title: 加拿大企业吸收关税成本，抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 许多加拿大公司还没有因为关税而向客户收取更高的价格，这表明与美国持续的贸易争端所带来的通胀压力可能会被推迟。【原文：Many Canadian companies aren’t yet charging their customers higher prices because of tariffs, a sign that inflation pressure stemming from the ongoing trade dispute with the US may be delayed.】
